name: fortinet-fortiauthenticator
label: Fortinet FortiAuthenticator
description: FortiAuthenticator provides centralized authentication services for the Fortinet Security Fabric including single sign on services, certificate management, and guest management.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Fortinet FortiAuthenticator server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Specify the Username used to access the Fortinet FortiAuthenticator server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: Specify the API key configured for your account for using the Fortinet FortiAuthenticator APIs.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get Schema
operations.description: Retrieves a report for all the endpoint actions within FortiAuthenticator.

operations.title: Create Local User
operations.description: Creates a new local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator based on the username, password, email, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Username
parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Specify the name of the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Note: You can specify a max length of 253 and the username must contain only letters, numbers, and @/./+/-/_ characters.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Note: You can specify a max length of 253 and the username must contain only letters, numbers, and @/./+/-/_ characters.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Specify the password for the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Note: You can specify a max length of 50.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the password for the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Note: You can specify a max length of 50.

parameters.title: Email
parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Specify the email address for the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email address for the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

parameters.title: First Name
parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Specify the first name of the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Note: You can specify a max length of 30.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the first name of the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Note: You can specify a max length of 30.

parameters.title: Last Name
parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Specify the last name of the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Note: You can specify a max length of 30.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the last name of the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Note: You can specify a max length of 30.

parameters.title: Activate/Deactivate
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Select this option (default is selected) to activate the account status of the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option (default is selected) to activate the account status of the user from which you want to create a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify additional fields, in the JSON format, that you want to add to the local user that you are creating in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
parameters.description: Specify additional fields, in the JSON format, that you want to add to the local user that you are creating in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

operations.title: Get Local User List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of local users from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this value is set as 20 and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this value is set as 20 and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say users starting from the 10th user. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say users starting from the 10th user. By default, this is set as 0.

operations.title: Get Specific Local User
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific local user from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator based on the user ID, username, or email you have specified.

parameters.title: Search User By
parameters.description: Select the method using which you want to search for the specific local user in the Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. You can search for the specific local user and retrieve its details using one of the following options: ID, Username, or Email.
parameters.name: output_mode
parameters.tooltip: Select the method using which you want to search for the specific local user in the Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. You can search for the specific local user and retrieve its details using one of the following options: ID, Username, or Email.

ID.title: User ID
ID.name: id
ID.description: If you choose 'ID', then in the User ID field specify the ID of the local user whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
ID.tooltip: If you choose 'ID', then in the User ID field specify the ID of the local user whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

Username.title: Username
Username.name: username
Username.description: If you choose 'Username', then in the Username field specify the username of the local user whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
Username.tooltip: If you choose 'Username', then in the Username field specify the username of the local user whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

Email.title: Search by Email
Email.name: email
Email.description: If you choose 'Email', then in the Email field specify the email address of the local user whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
Email.tooltip: If you choose 'Email', then in the Email field specify the email address of the local user whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

operations.title: Update Local User Status
operations.description: Updates the user status of a specific local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator based on the user ID and status you have specified.

parameters.title: User ID
parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the user from which you want to update the status of a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the user from which you want to update the status of a local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

parameters.title: Activate/Deactivate
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Select this option (default is selected) to activate the account status of the local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Clear this option to deactivate the account status of the local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option (default is selected) to activate the account status of the local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator. Clear this option to deactivate the account status of the local user in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.

operations.title: Get User Lockout Policy Info
operations.description: Retrieves User Lockout Policy details from Fortinet FortiAuthenticator.
